---
title: Themes
---
= Themes =
Various color schemes to try out. These appear in rc syntax, so they may require some modification to work with your configuration.

== default ==
WMII_FOCUSCOLORS=(<font color="'#ffffff'">''#ffffff''</font> <font color="'#153F1F'">''#153F1F''</font> <font color="'#2A7F3F'">''#2A7F3F''</font>)

WMII_BACKGROUND=<font color="'#333333'">''#333333''</font>

WMII_NORMCOLORS=(<font color="'#222222'">''#222222''</font> <font color="'#5FBF77'">''#5FBF77''</font> <font color="'#2A7F3F'">''#2A7F3F''</font>)

WMII_FOCUSCOLORS=(<font color="'#000000'">''#000000''</font> <font color="'#cae682'">''#cae682''</font> <font color="'#303030'">''#303030''</font>)

WMII_BACKGROUND=<font color="'#000000'">''#000000''</font>
